#summary Infested low healing boost.
#labels D-Cvar

= Description =

Heals marines by this value + the value set in [asw_marine_health_regen_amount_low] *if* the marine's health is below the percentage set in [asw_marine_health_regen_threshold] *and* they are currently infested.
